DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether PUR118 safe tolerable population subject Cystic Fibrosis .
DOC.brief_title: A Safety Tolerability Study OF PUR118 In Subjects With Cystic Fibrosis
DOC.criteria: Males nonpregnant , nonlactating healthy female . Age 18 55 year age ( inclusive ) day sign informed consent . Subject BMI 17 great . Subject confirm diagnosis cystic fibrosis document compatible clinical radiographic presentation , definitive accept lab clinical criterion ( e.g. , sweat chloride > 60 mEq/L 2 disease cause CFTR mutation ) OR regularly attend Consultant lead clinic diagnosis Cystic Fibrosis doubt . Subject FEV1 â‰¥ 45 % predict screening . Subject oxygen saturation > 92 % room air determine pulse oximetry screening . Subject nonsmoker exsmoker smoke least six month prior screen . Subject otherwise medically stable without clinically significant abnormal screening result depart usual baseline level health subject CF . Must willing able communicate English participate whole study . Must provide write informed consent . Subject unstable lung disease , define change medical regimen precede 2weeks , significant new find chest radiograph ( pneumothorax , lobar/segmental collapse ) , opinion Investigator , decline pulmonary status within last year consider part usual , chronic progression CF lung disease part baseline health condition subject CF . Subject exacerbation respiratory symptom within past 30 day require initiation new alter respiratory therapy . Subject either upper low respiratory illness within 30 day prior dose day , symptom illness resolve . Subject history lung transplantation . Females child bear potential pregnant , lactate . Females sexually active either surgically sterile willing use acceptable form contraception Clinically significant abnormal biochemistry , haematology urinalysis consistent CF judge Investigator Failure satisfy Investigator fitness participate reason .
